text:
2-2-2
Other sessions of the two-day meeting are expected to in¬
clude appearances by a broadcast network music director, a Washington
music critic, and a network music program producer. The music
directors will participate in workshop sessions on music programming
for educational stations, recording techniques, and legal clearance
problems.
Kathryn Fraser, music director of WFIU, is chairman of the
conference.
—0—
